name: Kami of Mourning
originalText: Whenever Kami of Mourning enters the battlefield, target creature you control or creature card in your graveyard perpetually gains "Whenever a creature you control with greater mana value than this card dies, return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped."
text: Whenever Kami of Mourning enters the battlefield, target creature you control or creature card in your graveyard perpetually gains "Whenever a creature you control with greater mana value than this card dies, return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped."
